sentences.sContent: In one study, light smokers were found to be more than twice as likely to get cataracts as non-smokers.
sentences.sCn: 一项研究表明，轻度烟民患白内障的比例是不吸烟者的两倍以上。

synos.tran: [眼科]白内障；[水文]大瀑布；暴雨，洪水；奔流

remMethod.val: cata (向下) + ract (冲) → 大瀑布

trans.tranOther: a medical condition that causes the  lens  of your eye to become white, so that you slowly lose your sight
